contentEncoded:
Still wondering what to wear for Halloween? Wonder no more, Craigslist has the answer. As always. Thanks to Alyson for sending in this tip! 

“Bloody” Wedding dress Size 12/14 Great Halloween Thing (Behind Nashboro Village)

“Bloody” Wedding dress Size 12/14 Great Halloween Thing 
Used it for photo shoot. 
Just the shell. no lining or pettycoat, just the dress. 
The zipper is out but is in perfect condition just sew it or pin it. 
Has some stains that look like ink. Not as red as the pic of me since it has soaked in a little bit.
It’s free and hallooweeny.

Yum.
